p: One case of MAYV was detected in a study carried out from 1966 through 1967 ( 33). In this instance, a citizen of the United States of America who was conducting studies assessing the feasibility of routes for a new, sea-level canal in Panama or Colombia demonstrated a significant rise in viral MAYV antibodies ( 33). Unfortunately, due to study group cross-over, it was unclear whether the virus was acquired in Panama or Colombia ( 33).
